{{{
string_t request_scalar(string_t name)
}}}

This does the same as calling `Request.getForm(name)`.
It is the same as `$_REQUEST[name]` in PHP.

{{{
gint request_array(string_t key, gchar**& vals)
}}}

This is the same as calling `return Request.getForms(key + "[]", vals)`.
It is the same as `$_REQUEST[name]` but PHP automatically detects
